name: obsidian-sample-plugin
description: Prj Plugin - Project, Document, and Task Management

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && node copy-plugin-files.js
scripts.version:patch: node bump-version.js patch && node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.version:minor: node bump-version.js minor && node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.version:major: node bump-version.js major && node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
